explanation: Funds are transferred to Defense Information Systems Agency (DISA)’s Operation and Maintenance, 17/17, appropriation from Program Element (PE) 0305172K Comibined Advance Applications budget line funded in its Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Defense-Wide, 17/18, appropriation for proper execution. The purpose for the funds, as justified to and approved by Congress, is not changed. Defails are classified. This is a base budget requirement.

Funds budgeted for the Office of the Inspector General’s procurement:of COTS products and the associated testing, design, and development.to modify the COTS software to support the DCATSe (Case Management System) and the CRIMS ate more appropriately executed in its RDT&E, 17/18, appropriation vice its O&M, 17/17, appropriation. Therefore, this action transfers funds for the proper execution. This is base budget funding.
